description: The combination of ogc_fid, ogc_fidID, MAPSHEET and SRC_FILENAME is a unique identifier across all counties. All four are needed to create the unique id that traces back to the source polygon.
Only one LYR layer possible. If species info present, stand structure is S.
Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Custom function decides if NFL layer is present based on rules in NFL table.
